رسالة من مرسل خارجي - كن حذرًا مع الروابط والمرفقات

Dear Monia,

 

Please find attached documents for SC 4372871.

Kindly let us know once the agent has got the greenlight to collect the shipment, so we can follow up for the collection.

 

Regards,

Lucille QUINNY

Supply Chain Executive | Fragrance and Beauty  

 

CHANEL Middle East & India

Dubai Design District

Dubai, U.A.E

Mobile: +971 5 66892688

Disclaimer: This email message including any attachments are confidential to the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this e-mail is strictly prohibited. It may not be disclosed to or used by anyone other than its intended recipient, nor may it be copied in any way. If received in error please email a reply to the sender, and then delete it from your system. Nasco may monitor and record e-mail traffic and data. NASCO accepts no liability for any damage caused by any virus transmitted by this email. 

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email (including any attachments) is confidential and intended only for the use of the addressee(s). It may contain information covered by legal, professional or other privileges. If you are not the intended addressee, please inform the sender immediately and destroy this email. Any views expressed in this communication are those of the individual sender, except where the sender explicitly and with authority states them to be the views of Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf) B.S.C.(c). Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects.

Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ إشعار بالسرية: يعتبر هذا البريد الإلكتروني (وبالإضافة لأي مرفقات) سرّي ومخصّص فقط لاستخدام المُرسَل إليه (المُرسَل إليهم). قد يحتوي على معلومات لحقوق أو امتيازات قانونية أو مهنية أو أخرى. إذا لم تكن المُرسَل إليه المقصود، يرجى إبلاغ المُرسِل على الفور وإتلاف هذا البريد الإلكتروني. أي وجهات نظر أو آراء يتم التعبير عنها أو ذكرها في هذه الرسالة هي آراء المرسل الشخصيّة، باستثناء الحالات التي يوضّحها المرسل بشكل صريح وبالسُلطة المخوّلة إليه بأنها وجهات نظر مجموعة الخليج للتأمين (الخليج) ش.م.ب. (م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب. {
